power.title: Battering Command
power.fluff: The slam of your weapon causes your foe to double over, enabling an ally to capitalize on the opening
power.section: Trigger:On your turn, you hit an enemy with a melee attack

section.name: Target:
section.target: one ally in your warlord's aura

power.section: Effect:The target can make a basic attack against the triggering enemy. He or she can make the attack as either a free interrupt or a free reaction to the triggering attack.
true 1 Inspiring Presence:The target gainst temporary hit points equal to your Charisma modifier. If the target is bloodied, he or she gains 5 + your Charisma modifier temporary hit points instead.
true 1 Skirmishing Presence:The target can shift a number of squares equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier before making the attack.
true The triggering attack also knocks the triggering enemy prone.

power.title: Bloody Ending
power.fluff: You guide your allies to finish off a wounded foe
power.section: true Effect:Until the end of your next turn, you and allies in your warlord's aura have a +1 bonus to attack rolls against bloodied enemies, and and can score critical hits on a natural roll of 19 or 20 against them.
true 1 Inspiring Presence:You and allies in the aura also have a bonus to AC against bloodied enemies. The bonus equals one-half your Charisma modifier.
true 1 Resourceful Presence:You and allies can choose to have combat advantage instead of scoring critical hits on a natural roll of 19 or 20. This choice is made separately for each attack.
true 1 Tactical Presence:You and allies also gain a power bonus to damage rolls against bloodied enemies. The bonus equals your Intelligence modifier.
true If you hit a bloodied enemy with an attack, the bonus to attack rolls increases to +2.

power.title: Deadly Distraction
power.fluff: You strike your foe hard, delivering a wound that keeps them distracted while you and your allies reposition
power.section: Trigger:On your turn, you hit an enemy with a melee or ranged attack
true Effect:The triggering attack deals +1d4 additional damage.
true Until the end of your next turn, while the triggering enemy is in your warlord's aura, it cannot trigger actions based on you and your allies' movement.

power.title: Devastating Setup
power.fluff: You knock the enemy aside and call forth a nearby ally to capitulate
power.section: Prerequisite:You must have the opportune command class power.
true Effect:You either slide the target 1 square, or push it up to 3 squares.
true You then use your opportune command class power, and must choose the target as the target enemy.

true 1 Inspiring Presence:If the target ally hits, he or she can end one effect on himself or herself that a save can end. If the target ally has no effect that a save can end, he or she can attempt a saving throw against one effect that doesn't normally end on a save.

true 1 Resourceful Presence:If the target ally's attack hits, the target enemy takes a penalty to all attack rolls with the first attack it makes before the end of your next turn. The penalty equals one-half your Wisdom modifier.
true 1 Skirmishing Presence:The target ally can shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier before making the attack.
true 1 Tactical Presence:The target ally's attack deals additional damage equal to your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Dicey Predicament
power.fluff: Surrounded by enemies, you fake weakness and make them careless
power.section: Requirement:You must either be flanked, or be adjacent to 3 or more non-minion enemies.
Effect:Until the end of your next turn, your warlord's aura gains the following benefits:
Allies in the aura gain combat advantage against enemies adjacent to you.
If you hit an enemy with a melee attack, allies also gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls against that enemy while it remains within your reach.

power.title: Follow Me In
power.fluff: You rush into battle with a decisive attack, rallying your friends behind you

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and each ally in the burst who can see or hear you

power.section: true Effect:Each target ally gains a +1 bonus to speed until the end of your next turn.
true 1 Skirmishing Presence:The bonus equals one-half your Intelligence modifier (minimum +2).
You charge an enemy. Your charge attack deals an additional +1[W] damage (or +1d8 additinal damage if it is not a Weapon attack).
If your charge attack hits, allies benefiting from the speed bonus deal additional damage against the enemy you charged. The damage equals one-half your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.

1 Inspiring Presence:If an ally benefiting from the speed bonus charges the same enemy you charged, they have a bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by that charge. The bonus equals your Charisma modifier.
1 Resourceful Presence:An ally benefiting from the speed bonus has a bonus to all defenses triggered by their movement. This bonus equals one-half your Wisdom modifier.
1 Tactical Presence:If an ally benefiting from the speed bonus charges the same enemy you charged, the additional damage increases to your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Hold the Line
power.fluff: Hearing your snap commands, your allies hold their ground
power.section: Trigger:You, or one or more allies in your warlord's aura would be pushed, pulled, or slid
true Effect:Each target is not affected by the triggering forced movement
true 1 Inspiring Presence:Each target has resist all equal to 2 + your Charisma modifier against the triggering attack.
true 1 Skirmishing Presence:Each target can shift one-half the distance of the forced movement (minimum 1 square) as a free reaction to the triggering attack.
One target makes a basic attack against the source of the forced movement. He or she makes it as a free reaction to the triggering attack.
true 1 Resourceful Presence:The ally making the attack can make a melee or ranged at-will attack instead of a basic attack.
true 1 Tactical Presence:The ally making the attack gains a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Inspire Resilience
power.fluff: You follow a solid hit with words that bolster your allies
power.section: Effect:You make a basic attack.

Until the start of your next turn, allies in your warlord's aura have resist all equal to 2 + one-half your [Wisdom or Charisma] modifier, or half this if your attack did not hit. If you scored a critical hit, the resistance increases by +3.

If an enemy attacks an ally benefiting from this resistance, that ally gains a bonus to the first damage roll he or she makes against that enemy. The bonus equals your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier, and must come before the end of his or her next turn.

power.title: Inspiring War Cry
power.fluff: As you strike, you shout a fierce war cry that shakes your foe and jolts a friend from succumbing to trouble
power.section: Trigger:On your turn, you hit an enemy within 5 squares of you with an attack

section.name: Target:
section.target: the triggering enemy, and one ally in the burst who can hear you

power.section: true Effect:The triggering attack deals deals +1d6 additional damage to the triggering enemy, and the target enemy takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the start of your next turn. The penalty increases to -3 if your triggering attack was a critical hit.

true The target ally can make a saving throw against one effect that a save can end. If your triggering attack was a critical hit, the target ally can make a saving throw against any one effect, even if it normally doesn't allow a save.
true If the target ally is not under any harmful or negative effect, he or she instead gains a +3 bonus to the first attack roll he or she makes before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Interrupting Combo
power.fluff: Your weapon strikes a foe, forcing it to focus on you lest an ally gets a chance for a strike of his or her own
power.section: Trigger: bold On your turn, you hit an enemy with a melee or ranged attack
true Effect: bold You deal +1d4 additional damage to the triggering enemy, and mark it until the end of your next turn.
true One ally can take the following action before the end of your next turn:

Immediate Interrupt:Trigger: The enemy marked by this power makes an attack that does not include you as a target; The ally taking the action makes a basic attack against the marked enemy. On a hit, the enemy takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls for the triggering attack.
true If you have the opportune commmand class power, its effects apply to this attack.

power.title: Martial Doom
power.fluff: You probe an enemy with an attack, then point out an opening that any ally with will or daring can seize
power.section: true Effect:You make a basic attack.

Until the end of your next turn, allies in your warlord's aura have combat advantage against the enemy you attacked, and deal additional damage against it equal to one-half your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.
true Each time an ally hits the target with an attack made during an extra action gained by spending an action point, the additional damage increases by +2.

power.title: No Gambit Is Wasted
power.fluff: Noticing that an ally failed at a difficult feat, you interrupt the flow of combat to give him or her another chance to use the attack
power.section: Trigger:An ally in in your warlord's aura misses every target with an encounter or daily attack

section.name: Target:
section.target: the triggering ally, and either you or another ally in your warlord's aura

power.section: true Effect:If the triggering attack was an encounter attack, the triggering ally regains the use of that power at the start of his or her next turn and gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls with the regained power during that turn. If the triggering attack was a daily attack, he or she regains the use of that power the next time he or she takes a short rest.
true 1 Inspiring Presence:The triggering ally gains temporary hit points equal to 5 + your Charisma modifier.
true 1 Skirmishing Presence:Either the triggering ally or the second target can shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier as a free interrupt.
true The second target makes a basic attack against a target of the triggering attack as an opportunity reaction.
true 1 Resourceful Presence:The second target can use a melee or ranged at-will attack instead of a basic attack.
true 1 Tactical Presence:The second target gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Intelligence modifier.

power.title: Shielding Retaliation
power.fluff: You guide an ally to a powerful retaliation while protecting another that has come under assault
power.section: Trigger:An enemy hits an ally adjacent to you

section.name: Target:
section.target: you, and one ally in your warlord's aura

power.section: true Effect:The triggering attack hits you instead, and the target ally makes a basic attack against the triggering enemy as a free reaction to the enemy's attack.
true 1 Inspiring Presence:The target ally gains a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.
true 1 Resourceful Presence:The target ally gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier.
true 1 Skirmishing Presence:Either the triggering ally or the target ally can shift a number of squares equal to your Intelligence modifier as a free interrupt.
true 1 Tactical Presence:The target ally makes his or her attack as a free interrupt to the triggering attack hitting you.

power.title: Warlord's Strike
power.fluff: One convincing strike is all you need to expose the enemy's weakness and spur your allies into finishing it off
power.section: Effect:You make a basic attack. The attack deals +1[W] additional damage (or +1d8 additional damage if it is not a Weapon attack).
true Until the end of your next turn, allies in your warlord's aura have a bonus to damage rolls against the target of your attack. The bonus equals one-half your [Intelligence or Wisdom] modifier.
true 1 Inspiring Presence:Until the end of your next turn, allies in your aura have a bonus to all defenses against the triggering enemy equal to your Charisma modifier.
true 1 Resourceful Presence:Until the end of your next turn, allies in your aura gain a bonus to all defenses equal to one-half your Wisdom modifier.

true 1 Skirmishing Presence:Until the end of your next turn, allies in your aura gain gain a +1 bonus to speed, and a bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by their movement equal to your Intelligence modifier.
true 1 Tactical Presence:The bonus to damage equals your Intelligence modifier.
